price: Na msimfanyie kiburi Mwenyezi Mungu; hakika mimi nitakuleteeni uthibitisho ulio wazi.
arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: Wala msimfanyie kiburi Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kumkadhibisha Mtume wake, kwani mimi nakuleteeni muujiza ulio wazi wa kubainisha ukweli wa Unabii wangu na Utume wangu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-an lā taʿlū ʿalā al-lahi innī ātīkum bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
